name: Atlantis Casino Resort Spa
description: Located in the heart of Reno, Nevada, the AAA Four Diamond Atlantis Casino Resort Spa has always been a favorite hotel destination for travelers near and far. Recognized for luxurious accommodations, dynamic casino action, TripAdvisor's Top-Ranked restaurants, Reno's only Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star Spa and state-of-the-art meeting facilities, Atlantis offers everything you're looking for and more.
shortDescription: AAA Four Diamond resort with Forbes Four-Star Spa, top-ranked restaurants, and dynamic casino action in the heart of Reno.
highlights: #1 Reno-Tahoe Resort – 7 years straight on TripAdvisor
Reno's only Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star Spa

roomTypes.name: Atlantis Tower Room
roomTypes.description: King or two queen rooms with distinctive décor, oversized windows with city or mountain views, custom Sealy pillow-top mattress, luxurious linens, and down comforter. 375 sq ft with 9 ft ceilings.

roomTypes.name: Premier Room
roomTypes.description: Newly redesigned rooms with walk-in showers, modern textures, and comfortable styling. Available in king or two queen configurations.

roomTypes.name: Luxury Tower Room
roomTypes.description: Upscale furnishings with plush bedding, rich marble accents, luxury bath products, and 50-inch flat screen HDTV with multimedia launch pad. 375 sq ft.

roomTypes.name: Concierge Tower Room
roomTypes.description: All-new rooms on floors 21-27 with exclusive 25th floor Concierge Lounge access featuring complimentary continental breakfast and afternoon hors d'oeuvres. Warm woods and Michelangelo Marble.

roomTypes.name: Concierge Luxury Suite
roomTypes.description: Starting at 600 sq ft with breathtaking panoramas, steam shower, dry sauna, spa tub, wet bar, and in-mirror vanity TV. Exclusive Concierge Lounge access.

roomTypes.name: Bar Suite
roomTypes.description: 460 sq ft Premier Bar Suite with private wet bar and Concierge Lounge access. Perfect for unwinding after a day on the course.

roomTypes.name: Executive Spa Suite
roomTypes.description: Spacious 1,100 sq ft two-room suite with in-room jetted tub, separate living area, and premium amenities throughout.

dining.name: Bistro Napa
dining.description: Napa Valley-inspired fine dining with an extensive wine list.

dining.name: Toucan Charlie's Buffet & Grille
dining.description: All-you-can-eat buffet with diverse international options.

dining.name: Red Bloom
dining.description: Asian-inspired cuisine in a vibrant setting.

dining.name: Sky Terrace Oyster Bar
dining.description: Fresh oysters and seafood with panoramic views.

faqs.question: What golf courses are near Atlantis Casino Resort Spa?
faqs.answer: ArrowCreek Country Club, LakeRidge Golf Course, Wolf Run Golf Club, and Red Hawk Golf Resort are all within 20 minutes of Atlantis.

faqs.question: Does Golf the High Sierra offer packages with Atlantis?
faqs.answer: Yes — custom stay-and-play packages include lodging at Atlantis, tee times at nearby courses, carts, and concierge planning. Call 888-584-8232.

faqs.question: What amenities does Atlantis have for golfers?
faqs.answer: Forbes Four-Star Spa for post-round recovery, 7 restaurants for group dinners, sports bar for watching games, and a full casino for evening entertainment.
